items.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
items.description: Revives and restores 50/100/150 HP to the target fallen character

items.name: Fisherman's Toast
items.description: Increases the party's defense by 88/107/126 for 300 seconds

items.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
items.description: Restores 8/9/10% of Max HP and an additional 800/1,000/1,200 HP to the target character

items.name: Apple Cider Vinegar
items.description: Restores 26% of Max HP and regenerates 570 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds for the selected character

items.name: Berry & Mint Burst
items.description: Increases the party's Critical Rate by 16% for 300 seconds

items.name: Wolfhook Juice
items.description: Increases the party's attack by 114 for 300 seconds

items.name: Pop's Teas
items.description: Restores 14% of Max HP and regenerates 350 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds for the selected character
